title: Chinese Soul in a French Body: A Romantic Connection with China
body: It is not uncommon to feel an inner struggle between two forces: optimism and pessimism, determination and procrastination, or…wanting to eat a cookie and keeping your dietary commitments. Perhaps less common is a feeling of belonging to two different cultures. As we constantly strive to balance these opposing forces we learn a lot about ourselves.?
